results.title: De novo molecular subtyping of salivary gland tissue in the context of Sjogren's syndrome heterogeneity.
results.text_hl: Type I helper T cells and B cells were the dominant cell types in C1 and C3 tissues, respectively. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ and drugs targeting PI3K, @GENE_BTK @GENE_695 @@@BTK@@@, and JAKs were predicted to be effective treatments for C1 and @<m>DISEASE_Complement_Component_3_Deficiency_Autosomal_Recessive</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C565169 @@@C3@@@ subtypes, respectively.

citations.NLM: Jung SM, Baek IW, Park KS, Kim KJ. De novo molecular subtyping of salivary gland tissue in the context of Sjogren's syndrome heterogeneity. Clin Immunol. 2022 Dec;245():109171. PMID: 36343899
